review: We've been trying to decide between a number of competing products in this category and had to accelerate our decision before an upcoming road trip so we'd have the ability to watch movies in hotel room(s) without the nearly $20 movie prices at most hotels.  The final choice for the Fire TV stick came down to our heavy use of Prime and Netflix.  Product shipped fast and my Amazon Prime Acct info was already loaded so we were up and running in minutes.  We had standard hotel broadband and had no issues watching Netflix movies/shows on our trip.  One tip if you plan to use this in hotels - take a 8-10 foot extension cord with you!  Many of the hotel entertainment stands are heavy or secured in place making it very difficult to reach the outlets behind the tv so having a cord you can run to an easily accessible wall outlet will save you a lot of frustration and maybe even your back!  Extremely please with this purchase!
